attributes.action: never ever allow wire barriers to be placed on brittish roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
acording to MCN (motorcycle news)IAM (institute for advanced mororist)have stated that rural roads should be fitted with wire crash barriers "cheese cutters" that would and have (in NZ 21 so far) cut riders in half
i appeal to the government to never consider this and for all riders motorcycle and bycicle to consider hitting one of those and think about the consequences and with one voice say NO!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "never ever allow wire barriers to be placed on brittish roads."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19081


Prime Minister's Office
